name: digitalocean-tools-vsts
description: DigitalOcean task for the Visual Studio Team Services system
author: Marcelo Forment√£o <marceloavf3@hotmail.com>

scripts.lint: yarn run tslint -t codeFrame -p tsconfig.json -c tslint.json && yarn run prettier "{Src,Tests}/**/*.ts" --write
scripts.dev: yarn run clean && yarn run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node Config/build.js
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node Config/build.js
scripts.package: yarn run build && yarn run vsts-build-tools-package
